author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
The National Green Tribunal has issued notice to the Ministry of Defence and the Jammu and Kashmir government over a meadow identified by the Army in central Kashmir for opening a firing range.

A Bench, headed by Tribunal Chairperson Justice Swatantra Kumar, issued the notice, admitting a petition from social activist Raja Muzaffar Bhat. Bajpathri, a meadow at Yusmarg in Budgam district, was identified by the Army for setting up a firing range after the facility on the Tosamaidan was closed last year. The petition wanted the government not to grant lease till the Tribunal delivered its verdict.
title: NGT notice on J&K firing range
